duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, manage, and support all aspects of public company Board and Committee meetings.
Provide comprehensive support to the Board of Directors and communicate directly with Directors, Executives, and their assistants on Board and Committee related matters.
Prepare Board and Committee meeting schedules, agendas, minutes, and resolutions.
Manage posting, publishing, and updating of Board and Committee materials via online platform (Diligent) and oversee logistics for in-person meetings.
Develop and manage Board and Committee calendars, track against regulatory and other requirements, and execute on corporate governance activities.
Oversee and track expense reporting for Board-related expenses and reconciliation for Directors.

Work closely with the Legal, Risk & Sustainability (LRS) department on projects, tasks, and initiatives as needed, including legal, compliance, and litigation notifications; risk and insurance program needs; sustainability program needs; and vendor management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience, Master's preferred.
